Interface AddonManager

  • Method Details

    • fromInstance

      Optional<AddonContainer> fromInstance(Object instance)
      Retrieves a AddonContainer based on its instance.
      Parameters:
      instance - the instance
      Returns:
      the container

    • getAddon

      Optional<AddonContainer> getAddon(String id)
      Retrieves a AddonContainer based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the plugin ID
      Returns:
      the plugin, if available

    • getAddons

      Collection<AddonContainer> getAddons()
      Gets a Collection of all AddonContainers.
      Returns:
      the plugins

    • isAddonEnabled

      boolean isAddonEnabled(String id)
      Checks if an addon is enabled
      Parameters:
      id - The addon id
      Returns:
      true if the addon is enabled

    • loadAddonsToClasspath

      void loadAddonsToClasspath(Path directory) throws IOException
      Loads all plugins from the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory to load from
      Throws:
      IOException - if we could not open the directory

    • enableAllAddonsFromTheClasspath

      void enableAllAddonsFromTheClasspath()
      Loads all the addons from the classpath. This will get all the classes annotated with Addon and load them.

    • enableAddon

      void enableAddon(Class<?> addon)
      Enables an addon from its instance
      Parameters:
      addon - The addon instance

    • enableAllAddons

      void enableAllAddons()
      Enables all the addons that are currently loaded

    • disableAddon

      void disableAddon(Object addon)
      Disables an addon from its instance
      Parameters:
      addon - The addon instance

    • disableAllAddons

      void disableAllAddons()
      Disables all the addons that are currently loaded

    • disableAddon

      default void disableAddon(String id)
      Disables an addon from its id if the addon does not exist, nothing will happen
      Parameters:
      id - The addon id

    • reloadAddon

      void reloadAddon(Object addon)
      Reloads an addon from its instance
      Parameters:
      addon - The addon instance

    • reloadAllAddons

      void reloadAllAddons()
      Reloads all the addons that are currently loaded This will disable and enable all the addons that are currently loaded

    • reloadAddon

      default void reloadAddon(String id)
      Reloads an addon from its id
      Parameters:
      id - The addon id

    • destroyClassloader

      void destroyClassloader()
      Destroys the classloader This will remove all the addons from the classpath and will destroy the classloader.

      This will also disable all the addons that are currently loaded

      See Also:
      • disableAllAddons()

    • registerListener

      void registerListener(Object listener, AddonContainer addon)
      Registers a listener to the event manager
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener
      addon - The addon

    • registerListeners

      void registerListeners(Class<?> listener, AddonContainer addon)
      Registers a listener to the event manager
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener class
      addon - The addon

    • unregisterListener

      void unregisterListener(Object listener, AddonContainer addon)
      Unregisters a listener from the event manager
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener
      addon - The addon

    • unregisterListeners

      void unregisterListeners(AddonContainer addon)
      Unregisters all the listeners from the event manager that are registered by the addon
      Parameters:
      addon - The addon

    • registerCommand

      void registerCommand(Command command, AddonContainer addon)
      Registers a command to the command manager The command must be annotated with Command
      Parameters:
      command - The command to register
      addon - The addon

    • unregisterCommands

      void unregisterCommands(AddonContainer addon)
      Unregisters a command from the command manager The command must be annotated with CommandData
      Parameters:
      addon - The addon

    • getLoaded

      List<ClassLoader> getLoaded()
      Gets all the loaded classloaders
      Returns:
      A list of all the loaded classloaders
